Race.Name: Razorclaw Shifter
Race.Description:
Razorclaw Shifter is an Eberron Iconic (starting in Sharn) that represents a third Sub-race of Shifter, one focused on attacking things with claws. They get a unique set of attack animations when using Handwraps. This animation set is timed similar to Monk Handwrap animations.
Starts with 1 level of: Barbarian

Feat.Name: Razorclaw Shifter
Feat.Description: Passive: +1 Strength Active: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Strength and Dexterity, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Wisdom. When the form ends, however, you will become fatigued. Your form will last for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your Constitution. You can prematurely end your form by using the Dismiss Rage feat. This shares charges with Barbarian's Rage feat, and anything that grants bonuses while Raging will grant bonuses with this. Shifting your form in this way prevents Spellcasting

Stance.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Shifted Form

Feat.Name: Razorclaw Shifter Traits
Feat.Description: You are considered both a Humanoid and an Animal for the purpose of most spells and effects, such as the Magic Fang spell.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Razorclaw Shifter
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 to Attack and Damage with Melee Weapons per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Will Saving Throw per stack of this past life. This feat can be stacked up to three times.
